description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the management console in Symantec IM Manager before 8.4.18 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) refreshRateSetting parameter to IMManager/Admin/IMAdminSystemDashboard.asp, the (2) nav or (3) menuitem parameter to IMManager/Admin/IMAdminTOC_simple.asp, or the (4) action parameter to IMManager/Admin/IMAdminEdituser.asp.
